sql.where:
DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (
(SJ LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%' OR CN LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%')
SJ LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%'
CN LIKE '%' || #{search.searchTable} || '%'
)
AND USE_YN = #{search.useYn}

mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by rgst_dt ASC) as rownum, * from ( SELECT tbq.qna_id, tbq.cl_code, tbq.sj, tbq.cn, tbq.answ, tbq.answ_rgst_id, tbq.answ_rgst_dt, tbq.bf_qna_id, tbq.use_yn, tbq.del_yn, tbq.rgst_id, tbq.rgst_dt, tbq.modi_id, tbq.modi_dt, tbq.qna_stat, tbq.open_yn, tbq.view_cnt, tu.user_nm as rgst_nm, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = TU.DEPT_CODE) AS RGST_DEPT_NM FROM t_bbs_qna tbq left outer join t_user tu on tbq.rgst_id = tu.user_id WHERE coalesce(tbq.bf_qna_id,'')='' ) a
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_BBS_QNA

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.QNA_ID ASC) AS ROWNUM, A.QNA_ID, A.CL_CODE, A.SJ, A.CN, A.ANSW, A.ANSW_RGST_ID, A.ANSW_RGST_DT, A.OPEN_YN, A.QNA_STAT, A.BF_QNA_ID, A.VIEW_CNT, A.USE_YN, A.RGST_ID, A.RGST_DT, A.MODI_ID, A.MODI_DT, A.DEL_YN, A.NEXT_ID, A.NEXT_SJ, A.PRE_ID, A.PRE_SJ FROM ( SELECT QNA_ID, CL_CODE, SJ, CN, ANSW, ANSW_RGST_ID, ANSW_RGST_DT, OPEN_YN, QNA_STAT, BF_QNA_ID, VIEW_CNT, USE_YN, RGST_ID, RGST_DT, MODI_ID, MODI_DT, DEL_YN, LEAD(QNA_ID) OVER (ORDER BY QNA_ID) AS NEXT_ID, LEAD(SJ) OVER (ORDER BY QNA_ID) AS NEXT_SJ, LAG(QNA_ID) OVER (ORDER BY QNA_ID) AS PRE_ID, LAG(SJ) OVER (ORDER BY QNA_ID) AS PRE_SJ FROM T_BBS_QNA WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ) A WHERE QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_bbs_qna SET sj = #{sj}, cn = #{cn}, cl_code = #{clCode},
answ_rgst_id = #{answRgstId},
ANSW = #{answ},
answ_rgst_dt= now(), use_yn = #{useYn}, modi_id = #{modiId}, modi_dt = now(), open_yn = #{openYn}, qna_stat = #{qnaStat} WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
UPDATE t_bbs_qna SET del_YN = 'Y', modi_id = #{modiId}, modi_dt = now() WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
UPDATE T_BBS_QNA SET VIEW_CNT = (COALESCE(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1) WHERE QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
UPDATE T_BBS_QNA SET QNA_STAT = 'READED' WHERE QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( select a.qna_id ,a.bf_qna_id ,a.answ ,a.answ_rgst_id ,a.answ_rgst_dt ,b.user_nm as rgst_nm ,(select dept_nm from t_dept where dept_code = b.dept_code) as rgst_dept_nm ,a.rgst_id ,a.rgst_dt ,a.modi_id ,a.modi_dt , 0 AS lv FROM t_bbs_qna a left outer join t_user b on a.answ_rgst_id = b.user_id where a.qna_id =#{qnaId} union all select a.qna_id ,a.bf_qna_id ,a.answ ,a.answ_rgst_id ,a.answ_rgst_dt ,b.user_nm as rgst_nm ,(select dept_nm from t_dept where dept_code = b.dept_code) as rgst_dept_nm ,a.rgst_id ,a.rgst_dt ,a.modi_id ,a.modi_dt , R.lv + 1 AS lv FROM R join t_bbs_qna a on R.qna_id = a.bf_qna_id left outer join t_user b on a.answ_rgst_id = b.user_id where coalesce(a.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' ) select qna_id ,bf_qna_id ,answ ,answ_rgst_id ,answ_rgst_dt ,rgst_nm ,rgst_dept_nm ,rgst_id ,rgst_dt ,modi_id ,modi_dt , lv from R where lv>0 order by answ_rgst_dt
